about_the_game:
Embark on a high-stakes adventure in The Golden Caravan, a poker rogue-lite game where strategy and luck intertwine.

When your grandfather, a revered locksmith, is kidnapped by the ruthless gangster known as The Great Owl, it's up to you to infiltrate the infamous Golden Caravan casino and rescue him.

Will you manage to outwit The Great Owl, rescue your grandfather, and restore justice to a city suffocating under oppression?​



  • Battle enemies in dynamic, Poker-based encounters where the luck of the draw meets tactical prowess.
  • Dozens of Weapons to aid you in battle. If luck is not in your favor, a huge baseball bat might do the trick.
  • Use Tricks & Artefacts to unleash powerful combos, outsmart your opponents, and turn the tide of battle in your favor​​.
  • Through brief but impactful Dialogues, players will uncover the motives behind The Great Owl’s tyranny, and encounter allies and adversaries with their own stories and agendas​.
  • New challenges and combinations await in every Run, ensuring replayability and a fresh experience every time you dive in.​
  • [Art style / characters / ambience]

Can you escape the Golden Caravan's grip and bring down The Great Owl? Maybe, but in a place where fortune favors the bold, you'll need more than just luck on your side.​
